# FontFilterFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool FontFilterFunc(IntPtr family, IntPtr face, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| family | Transfer ownership: none |
| face | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

Transfer ownership: none
